libai.nn
Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
  libai.nn.NeuralNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Competitive, Hebb, Hopfield, Kohonen, MLP, Perceptron, SVM
public abstract class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Neural network abstraction. Provides the methods to train, simulate and calculate the error.

Author:
kronenthaler
See Also:

setPlotter

public void setPlotter(Plotter plotter)

setProgressBar

public void setProgressBar(ProgressDisplay pb)

train

public abstract void train(Matrix[] patterns,
                           Matrix[] answers,
                           double alpha,
                           int epochs,
                           int offset,
                           int length,
                           double minerror)
Train this neural network with the list of patterns and the expected answers. Use the learning rate alpha for many epochs. Take length patterns from the position offset until the minerror is reached.

Parameters:
patterns - The patterns to be learned.
answers - The expected answers.
alpha - The learning rate.
epochs - The maximum number of iterations
offset - The first pattern position
length - How many patterns will be used.
minerror - The minimal error expected.

simulate

public abstract Matrix simulate(Matrix pattern)
Calculate the output for the pattern.

Parameters:
pattern - Pattern to use as input.
Returns:
The output for the neural network.

simulate

public abstract void simulate(Matrix pattern,
                              Matrix result)
Calculate the output for the pattern and left the result in result.

Parameters:
pattern - Pattern to use as input.
result - The output for the input.

save

public boolean save(java.lang.String path)
Save the neural network to the file in the path

Parameters:
path - The path for the output file.
Returns:
true if the file can be created and written, false otherwise.

Parameters:

epochs - The maximum number of iterations
offset - The first pattern position

error

public double error(Matrix[] patterns,
                    Matrix[] answers)
Calculate from a set of patterns. Alias of error(patterns, answers, 0, patterns.length)

Parameters:
patterns - The array with the patterns to test
answers - The array with the expected answers for the patterns.
Returns:
The error calculate for the patterns.

error

public double error(Matrix[] patterns,
                    Matrix[] answers,
                    int offset,
                    int length)
Calculates the mean quadratic error. Is the standard error metric for neural networks. Just a few networks needs a different type of error metric.

Parameters:
patterns - The array with the patterns to test
answers - The array with the expected answers for the patterns.
offset - The initial position inside the array.
length - How many patterns must be taken from the offset.
Returns:
The mean quadratic error.

                                        double[] b)
Calculates the square Euclidean distance between two vectors.

Parameters:

b - Vector b.
Returns:

Parameters:

b - Matrix b.
Returns:
The square Euclidean distance.

gaussian

public static double gaussian(double u2,
                              double sigma)
Calculate the Gaussian function with standard deviation sigma and input parameter u^2

Returns:
e^(-u^2/2.sigma)
